data.name: Notice3
data.description: All-purpose script for an online classifieds website. It uses Symfony on the backend and VUE with styles from Twitter Bootstrap on the client side. Ideal for large advertising portals and intended for professional use.

data.name: MotoNotice
data.description: An advertising script tailored to the automotive industry. It allows the creation of local, national, or international websites with extensive functionality and user-friendly administration.

data.name: Demoty2
data.description: The Demoty2 script enables the creation of websites featuring demotivators and memes. It's based on the Twig template system and the CSS Bulma framework.

data.name: Holmes2
data.description: A script designed for real estate portals. Perfect for managing small and large real estate listings for sale, rent, or exchange. Suitable for local, national, or international portals.

data.name: Cuadro
data.description: Cuadro is a script for creating websites with pictures, photos, and videos from the web. Users can upload graphic and MP4 files and attach videos from YouTube, Vimeo, and DailyMotion.

data.name: Festa2
data.description: The Festa2 script allows the creation of websites with accommodation listings. It supports automatic payments, such as PayPal, and integrates with Google Maps via API and reCAPTCHA.

data.name: JobNotice
data.description: JobNotice is a modern script for websites featuring job offers and advertisements. It enables the creation of local, national, or international websites and offers opportunities for passive income through ads and promoting classifieds.

data.name: Corta
data.description: With the Corta script, you can easily create a simple website to shorten links, making long URLs more convenient for sharing on various social media and messenger apps.
